CustomField.formula: CASE(TEXT(App_Reviews__r.Source__c), 'Apple App Store', IMAGE('/resource/CC_Iconos/ios.png',"IOS",30,30) + " ", 'Google Play Store',IMAGE('/resource/CC_Iconos/android.png',"Android",30,30) + " ", 'Huawei App Store',IMAGE('/resource/CC_Iconos/huawei.jpg',"Huawei",30,30) + " ", '') + App_Reviews__r.Version__c
CustomField.label: Versión App
